title: My First Blog Post
content:
# Welcome to My Blog

This is the content of my **first** post. Written in markdown-style text.

## Features

- **Bold text** for emphasis
- *Italic text* for subtle emphasis
- `Code snippets` for technical content
- [Links](https://example.com) for references

### Code Example

```javascript
function greet(name) {
  return `Hello, ${name}!`;
}
```

> This is a blockquote to highlight important information.

## Lists

1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item

- Unordered list item
- Another item
- And another

---

*Thanks for reading!*
